name: GE M134 Minigun
description: The «GE M134 Minigun»(GE・M134 ミニガン,GE M134 Minigan?)is a heavy machine gun-class Gatling gun and one of the largest firearms available inGun Gale Online.Due to the weight of the gun, players wielding it are usually overweight and cannot run.The playtime required to obtain the Minigun is similar or longer than than that ofPGM Ultima Ratio Hecate IIand requires a large value of STR to wield.The weapon is based on the real lifeM134 Minigun.

name: Defense Field
description: ADefense Field(防護フィールド,Bōgo Fīrudo?), also known as an Anti-Beam Defense Field(対光弾防護フィールド,Tai-Koudan Bōgo Fīrudo?), is a device in «Gun Gale Online» that reduces or nullifies the damage dealt by optical guns.The effectiveness of the shield decreases in short range.

name: Karakurenai
description: «Karakurenai»(カラクレナイ,Karakurenai?)is the curved katana used by the guild leader of «Fuurinkazan»,Klein. This sword uses the «Katana»Extra Skill, which is unlocked by training the «Curved Sword» skill and sufficiently.

name: Crystal Bottle of Kales'Oh
description: Before the bottle is used, the user needs to use the properties window to select the skill they would like to store in the bottle. A skill already stored in the bottle can be retrieved by pulling out the stopper and inhaling the light-turned liquid inside the bottle. To store a skill already equipped, the user exhales their light-turned skill into the bottle, and the light turns into a liquid, the colour of which depends on the stored skill.

attributes.Kanji: カレス・オーの水晶瓶

name: Fragrant Olive Sword
description: The Fragrant Olive Sword is a longsword with a slender form. Every part of the sword from the guard to the pommel seem like they are made out of dazzling gold while the blade itself is dyed in a bright golden yellow distinctly more intense than the sword’s scabbard. A cross-shape flower design decorates the sword’s guard.

attributes.Kanji: 金木犀(きんもくせい)の剣

name: Type 54 "Black Star"
description: In the year 2020, Asada Shino, then eleven years old, entered a post office with her mother. Shortly afterwards, a robber armed with a Type 54 handgun and likely on narcotics entered, demanding money. The robber shot an employee after he attempted to activate an alarm, then threatened to shoot Shino's mother. At that point, Shino bit the man on the arm, causing him drop the gun, which Shino seized and shot him in the torso. Shino's attacker, however, was not killed by the first shot, in part ...

attributes.Kanji: 五四式・黒星(ヘイシン
attributes.User: Asada Shino (real life) Sterben (Gun Gale Online

name: Blackwyrm Coat
description: TheBlackwyrm Coat(ブラックウィルム・コート,Burakku Uirumu Kōto?)is a player-made black leather coat, tailored from black dragon leather, a high grade raw material, byAincrad's best player seamstress,Ashley, thatKiritowore in the final months ofSword Art Online.

name: Crystallite Ingot
description: A «Crystallite Ingot»(クリスタライト・インゴット,Kurisutaraito Ingotto?)is a high-grade weapon material inSword Art Online. The ingot is only found in X'rphan the White Wyrm's nestin theWest Mountainof the55thFloorafter starting a quest in the nearby village.It was rumored to require the presence of a master smith in apartyfor the crystal to be harvested.

name: Coat of Midnight
description: Coat of Midnight(コート・オブ・ミッドナイト,Kōto Obu Middonaito?)was theLast Attackbonus item acquired fromAincrad's 1st Floor Boss,Illfang the Kobold Lord. It wasKirito's first generation leather coat.

name: Elucidator
description: Elucidator is a pitch black sword with trims of gray. It has a black hilt connected to a hand guard that drops down on the right side. Attached to this elongated area of the hand-guard is part of Elucidator's blade, so as to better aid the user in retaining their grip on the sword when it is being used. The blade is completely black like the rest of the sword and the said blade is outlined in a light gray.In the design art by the illustrator of the novels, a small cross is emblazoned on the f...

name: Sword Breaker
description: Sword Breaker appears to be an ordinary dagger with a saw-shaped back portion. Despite its low offensive abilities, the Sword Breaker can become a powerful blade when used properly. When in combat, the Sword Breaker can be used to parry an opponent's weapon. If the back portion of the blade is used, it gives a slight bonus that increases the chance of destroying the opponent's weapon.

name: Object Eraser
description: The Object Eraser can only be summoned with the use of a GM console with a GM authority account. Once summoned, crimson flames come forth, coiling out of the user's arm until it takes the form of a sword.

name: Argyro's Sheet
description: The instant the cloth covers something, the sheet changed to the colour of the surface of the water, making it hardly possible to see the hidden objects; however, enough light passes through the sheet for people hiding under it to see through it.The durability of the item decreases by approximately ten percent per five minutes when the item’s ability is activated.The lost durability can be restored by repairing it using the Tailoringskill.

name: Gigas Cedar
description: TheGigas Cedar(ギガスシダー,Gigasu Shidā?)was a tree inRulid Villagethat blocked the way to the forest, as it absorbed the blessings of Solus and Terraria from its surroundings in an enormous range, preventing cultivation of crops in the area of the great tree. The tree had a diameter of four mels (meters) and a height of seventy mels (meters), standing four times higher than the bell tower of the Rulid church, the tallest building in Rulid, with its roots stretching as deep as it was tall. Its bar...

name: Goblin Sword
description: TheGoblin Swordrefers to a sword that belonged to an unnamed goblin that was part ofLizard Killer Ugachi's scouting party.Kiritostole this sword and commented that the goblin should clean the sword, as it was weak and almost unusable due to the lack of care. This sword was assumed to be a machete, as it was mentioned that the entire party ofgoblinswere carrying machetes. Its handle was wrapped by leather and it has an emblem of the goblin's clan on it.

name: Night Sky Sword
description: The «Night Sky Sword»(夜空の剣,Yozora no Ken?), often called "The Black One", is a Priority 46Divine Object-class long sword that isKirito's personal one-handed sword inUnderworld. In terms of Priority Class, it outscalesEugeo'sBlue Rose Sword.

name: Tremble Shortcake
description: The sponge cake has a radius of eighteen centimeters and a height of eight centimeters. It is made of theTrembling Cow's milk and over a liter of cream. The inside is arranged in four layers: sponge, strawberry-flavored cream, sponge, and strawberry-flavored cream. A bright red strawberry sits on the top of it.The cake is considered to be extremely delicious and is thus very expensive, exceeding the price of the three main dishes ofKiritoandAsuna's dinner at the same restaurant combined.Eatin...

attributes.Kanji: トレンブル・ショートケーキ

name: Lambent Light
description: «Lambent Light»(ランベントライト,Ranbento Raito?)was a one-handed rapier owned byAsunainSword Art Online(SAO). The rapier was crafted byLisbethas a masterpiece of a quality that she could only achieve once every three months.Asuna's rapier, combined with her speed, earned her the nickname «The Flash». The Lambent Light was boosted to +32 byLisbethand was Asuna's final weapon in Sword Art Online.

name: Ring of Angel's Whisper
description: The Ring of Angel's Whisper is a thin ring, decorated with the wings of an angel and a heart-shape gemstone.Although the ring does not raise the user's stats, it has a special magical ability that allows the user to send a voice message to a registered friend once a month via the ring.

name: Eternal Storage Trinket
description: AnEternal Storage Trinket(永久保存トリンケット,Eikyū Hozon Torinketto?)is a glossy silver cuboid storage box 10 cm in size that can be used to store and preserve the durability of small items that are the size of accessories, like rings. The box can only be crafted by a master-class craftsman and has a special ability of preventing the loss of durability of the items held inside the box, even if the box with the items are left alone in the wilderness.

attributes.Kanji: 永久保存トリンケット

name: Blue Rose Sword
description: The «Blue Rose Sword»(青薔薇の剣,Ao-bara no Ken?)is a Priority Class 45«Divine Object» class longsword found in the Mountain Range at the Edge inUnderworldthat eventually becameEugeo's personal sword. Its appearance is pure white, in contrast with Kirito's «Night Sky Sword», and is inscribed with a blue rose at the center of its guard. During Eugeo's battle againstQuinella, the sword was snapped in half. The sword remained in this broken state until the final stages of the War of Underworld, when ...

name: Mirage Sphere
description: The Mirage Sphere is a sphere-shapeyellowdevice with an intricate design on its sidesand a shining crystal ball inside.

attributes.Kanji: ミラージュ・スフィア

name: Crest of Yggdrasil
description: The Crest of Yggdrasil is a tree branch about 1.5 meters in length.The bark of the branch is smooth and it draws a spiral near its tip.Two large leaves glitter at the staff's tip.

attributes.Kanji: 世界樹の天辺の枝 (クレスト・オブ・イグドラシル

name: Scavenge Toad Meat
description: After defeating a number of Scavenge Toads in theHidden Dungeon,Kiritoacquired twenty-five pieces of Scavenge Toad Meat. Thinking that the meat would taste as good as its appearance was weird, he showed a piece of the meat toAsunaand asked her to cook it. However, disgusted by the meat, Asuna navigated the menu of their shared inventory until she found the meat and moved the meat onto the trash icon in the inventory to dispose of it.

attributes.Kanji: スカベンジトードの肉

name: Ragout Rabbit's Meat
description: The Ragout Rabbit's Meat is an ingredient used in cooking and is said to be the most delicious ingredient in the game. Due to its rarity and taste, it can be sold for a minimum of 100,000Cor, an amount of money that is more than enough to pay for a full set of the best armors. In order to successfully cook the meat, a player needs to have theirCooking skillat a high level.Stewing the meat is one of the multiple ways to cook it.

name: Kagemitsu G4
description: «Kagemitsu G4»(カゲミツG4,Kagemitsu G4?)is a photon sword(フォトンソード,Foton Sōdo?)sold for 150,000creditsinGun Gale Online. The sword is alternatively referred to as a«Kouken»(光剣,Kōken?, lit. "light sword"), laser blade, lightsaber or beam sabre.

name: Lightning Hammer Mjölnir
description: Lightning Hammer Mjölnir(雷槌ミョルニル,Raitsui Myoruniru?)is a legendary-class one-handed hammer inALfheim Onlinethat was rewarded toKleinfor choosing to rescueFreyja(Thor) during «The Holy Sword of the Ice Palace»quest. The hammer is currently in the possession ofLisbeth.

name: Ebon Dagger
description: TheEbon Dagger(イーボンダガー,Ībon Dagā?)is a one-handed dagger used bySilicainSword Art Online. It was given to her byKiritoafter being rescued from theDrunk Apesin the «Forest of Wandering» on the 35thFloor.

name: Ring of Agility
description: The ring is silvery-white, with a crimson-red gem in the centre of its front side, and is also emblazoned with several leaves next to the gem. The ring boosts the wearer's AGI stat by 20 points.

name: Frost Scale Whip
description: The whip was originally a two-headed white snake that was the lord of the largest lake in the eastern empire.Quinellacaptured the snake alive and used it as a base material for forming the whip. The whip inherited the snake's agility, the sharpness of its scales, and the accuracy of its aim.

name: Mate Chopper
description: The «Mate Chopper»(友切包丁,Meito Choppā?, lit. "friend-cutting cleaver")is a rare and powerful dagger-class cursed weapon that served asPoH's primary weapon inSword Art Online. It is amonster-drop, likely originating from aboss-level monster. Due to surpassing the best weapons any highest level player blacksmith could craft by April 2024, it was considered a maken(魔剣,maken?).[† 1]If the player were to lift the curse placed on the weapon, it would transform into a katana named Tomogiri-maru(友切丸,T...

name: Liberator
description: «Liberator»(リベレイター,Ribereitā?)is a weapon set consisting of a one-handed straight sword and a Kite shield inSword Art Online. The set was owned by the leader of the «Knights of the Blood» guild,Heathcliff, and was used until the end of the game. His «Unique Skill», «Holy Sword», allowed him to freely switch between offense and defense, creating a near impenetrable defense in battle.The sword, when not in use, is attached to inner side of the shield and the shield can also be used to hit targets.

name: Twin Edged Wings
description: The Twin Edged Wings are a set of extremely thin, approximately forty cen (centimetres)-long steel throwing blades that are bent in the middle. They had no grip to hold them by and both of their sides ended in sharp tips, which had to be held in-between the user's fingers when throwing.

name: Accuracy International L115A3
description: «Accuracy International L115A3»(アキュラシー・インターナショナル・L115A3,Akyurashī Intānashonaru L115A3?), nicknamed as «Silent Assassin»(沈黙の暗殺者,Sairento Asashin?)by the players, is a rare sniper equipped with a silencer that is used bySterbeninGun Gale Onlineto stun his targets from afar before going in to stage a murder with hisType 54 "Black Star".

name: Hand Mirror
description: The Hand Mirror is a plain rectangular glass mirrorwith a frame. The mirror is only slightly smaller than a player's face.

name: Black Lily Sword
description: TheBlack Lily Sword(黒百合の剣,Kuroyuri no Ken?)was aDivine Object-class sword used by theIntegrity KnightScheta Synthesis Twelve. The sword shattered during the War of Underworld, when Scheta fought against American players with the Dark Territory Army.

name: Dark Repulser
description: «Dark Repulser»(ダークリパルサー,Dāku Riparusā?)was a one-handed long sword, created byLisbethforKiritoout of aCrystallite Ingot, which was obtained from aspecial quest. Whenever Kirito used the «Dual Blades»skill, he wielded it alongside «Elucidator». This weapon was destroyed during the fight withHeathcliffon the 75thFloor.

name: Plasma Grenade
description: A plasma grenade is a ball-shaped, metal device.Once the grenade has been activated, one part of the grenade periodically flashes in red and creates a beeping sound.Once the timer expires, the grenade simultaneously causes both a regular explosion and an electrical discharge.The explosion deals direct damage to surrounding players, while the electrical discharge stuns the players that manage to survive the explosion.The explosion at point blank range is powerful enough to instantly kill even ...

name: Mighty Strap of Leather
description: The Mighty Strap of Leather is an upper-body slot armour, which consists of the player being half naked with only a leather belt being coiled around various places, and excludes any undergarments or armour from being worn on top of it. The armour has decent defensive strength and also grants the player a great strength bonus.

attributes.Kanji: マイティ・ストラップ・オブ・レザー

name: Procyon SL
description: The Procyon SL's grip is shaped in an ergonomic curve, with a high caliber gun barrel above the large trigger guard. It might be said to be a Bullpup style gun, with the dull machine part with heat vents placed somewhere behind and above the grip.

name: Starship Metal Estoc
description: Although regular swords do not exist in GGO, this weapon was crafted with the «Bayonet Creation» skill, a high-level version of the «Knife Creation» skill, using the best metal in the game: Galactic Warship's Plate Armor. The material is so strong that it can clash with the «Kagemitsu G4» while only suffering light burns.

name: Demonic Sword Gram
description: Gram is a large, two-handed crimson great sword with two entwined dragons etched on the surface of the blade.It features the unique ability «Ethereal Shift»(エセリアルシフト,Eseriaru Shifuto?), which allows it to phase through objects such as swords or shields in order to hit its target. However, once the ability has been activated, there is a slight delay before it can be activated again, thus it cannot be used in rapid succession.

name: Wind Fleuret
description: «Wind Fleuret»(ウインドフルーレ,Uindo Furūre?)is a rapier that wasAsuna’s primary weapon inSword Art Online, on the lower floors ofAincrad. It was amonsterdrop, obtained after followingKirito's battle advice, and replaced her store-bought «Iron Rapier».Up to sixenhancementscan be attempted on the «Wind Fleuret».

name: Holy Sword Excalibur
description: The «Holy Sword Excalibur»(聖剣エクスキャリバー,Seiken Ekusukyaribā?)is the strongest legendary weapon in «ALfheim Online», being the only weapon that surpasses the «Demonic Sword Gram».The sword is rewarded upon the completion ofThe Holy Sword of the Ice Palacequestand is currently in the possession ofKirito.

attributes.Kanji: 聖剣エクスキャリバー

name: Sap of the World Tree
description: Due to the fact the revival spells require one to master water and holy attribute magic, the item is used to revive fallen comrades by players who are unable to cast revival magic.

name: Blue Long Sword
description: TheBlue Long Swordrefers toKirito's unnamed secondary sword inALfheim Online. The sword was wielded along with Kirito'sunnamed black long swordduring the events ofCalibur. It was later replaced by the «Holy Sword Excalibur».

name: The Child's Egg
description: The Child's Egg is a large, green, semi-transparent egg in the shape of a perfect sphere. On the outside, the egg looks like a gigantic pearl, but, with enough lighting, an underdeveloped sea creature can be seen coiled inside the egg.

name: Metamaterial Optical Camouflage Mantle
description: The mantle has the Metamaterial Optical Camouflage ability that hides the user from the eyes of both players andmonstersby refracting the light that shines on its surface and is said to be the ultimate camouflage ability, which only a few high-levelbossmonsters have, in the game. The ability also allows the user to cloak their weapon after preparing it, making it possible for the user to shoot while invisible. Additionally, the cloak prevents the user from being detected by theSatellite Scand...

name: Dusk Lizard Hide
description: ADusk Lizard Hide(ダスクリザードの革,Dasuku Rizādo no Kawa?)is a drop from the «Dusk Lizard», a monster inSword Art Online. It can be used to create high-grade standard armor.
